## Guidance on how to install software for binning step for qiita plugin

conda activate qp_pacbio_2025.9
### new metawrap binning bash script add to qp_pacbio_2025.9 environments
### ger env path (after activate qp_pacbio_2025.9)
echo "$CONDA_PREFIX/bin"

### put all the metawrap modules into qp_pacbio_2025.9 bin path (generated by the echo command), I modified this one to be much faster
cp /ddn_scratch/jiz322/metawrap* path_to_current_env_bin

### check if it works. 
which metawrap

metawrap binning -h
